title: Increase Fizz E cooldown
body: With all the cooldown increase mage received, Fizz E really need to have a higher cooldown.. 16/14.5/13/11.5/10... When similar skill like Vlad pool is 28/25/22/19/16... Fizz don't need to be literally uncatchable all the time. He is already a pain to deal with when fed. Nerf this ability for good.

replies.body: And unlike Vladimir, Fizz's E forms a large part of his damage. His main mobility spell is also one of his main damage spells.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7ybNOH1H,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-08T05:31:31.326+0000)
>
> And unlike Vladimir, Fizz's E forms a large part of his damage. His main mobility spell is also one of his main damage spells.

His main mobility AND invulnerability spell also does huge damage.

On top of this, Vlad's pool protects him for a much higher amount of time on a champ that it is already difficult to do lasting damage to.

Basically, Vlad's pool is his last line of defense wheras Fizz's E is his bread and butter.

If you are going to compare two skills, please compare EVERYTHING about them, such as how Vlad's last longer being 2 seconds to .75, and how Vlad's can heal him and Fizz's can't, and how that is Fizz's main attack skill to Vlad just skill in general.

Comparing an assassins mobility to a mage

lol...
Some people don't know how to shutdown a champion who has no way to farm a wave unless they are in melee range

> He is already a pain to deal with when fed.

And how is this a bad thing? You're asking to gut a champion based on it being fed and then comparing the ability that makes up the champions identity with a defensive ability with a heal and lasts 1.25 seconds longer. I agree Fizz isn't fun to play against but I would rather cite the binary as hell burst combo than the E.
Didn't even read the op. Take my upvote.
